name: A Walk Past the Park
description:
"There's a park near where I live. I walk past it almost every day. I think about it often. It's nice. I've never been inside. Not once. I don't know why."

A Walk Past the Park is a short, lightly interactive vignette about the pressures, incentives, and structures that shape our behavior and values. 

  • Controlled with Mouse
  • Approximately 8 minutes in duration
  • Subtitles available under the accessibility menu
